thread.title: 'I just adore sex' Busty lawyer ditches job to become prostitute and LOVES it
thread.title_full: 'I just adore sex' Busty lawyer ditches job to become prostitute and LOVES it

title: 'I just adore sex' Busty lawyer ditches job to become prostitute and LOVES it
text:
“I also adore sex. I wouldn't be in this profession if I didn't like it” Claudia de Marchi 
Explaining her sudden change she said she grew tired of the “masculine selfishness and self-indulgence” of the legal profession. 
She adds: “I also adore sex. I wouldn't be in this profession if I didn't like it. So, I found a way to make money doing something that I like, marketing my sexual talent and my libido.” 
Her mum totally supports her new career and she moved closer to her daughter to help her run her new job. 
Claudia said: “One day my mother was watching a programme on TV interviewing luxury escort girls and was captivated by what they were saying." 
Claudia de Marchi HOT: Claudia now makes lots of money in her new career Jakarta's brothels: REVEALED Tuesday, 14th February 2017 Indonesia is one of relatively few countries where infection has rapidly increased. Brothel areas are one of the main battlegrounds for HIV prevention, and outreach workers are trying to stem the growth of the disease, which over the past decade has risen by 25 percent. 1 / 17 Getty Images The interior of a brothel in Jakarta 
The happy escort, originally from the Brazilian city of Sorriso, says she is a strong feminist and writes a blog to give sex tips for men. 
She gives tips on how to give women oral sex, proper behaviour and how to be a “real man”. 
Claudia de Marchi FEMINIST: Claudia writes a blog giving sex tips to blokes The most outrageous outfits from Rio Carnival Friday, 24th February 2017 The most outrageous outfits from Rio Carnival 1 / 16 A reveller attends to Imperio Serrano's parade during Rio de Janeiro's carnival 
Claudia de Marchi LAWYER: Claudia back when she worked as a top-notch lawyer 
Claudia is a bit picky with her men and says she won’t see men with bad grammar, men who talk about politics or blokes who won’t kiss her. 
She adds: “As much as I love sex, I cannot bring myself to get intimate with a fascist. 
“You don't have to talk about politics to have sex, but just to think about the nonsense they defend, the foolish things they say, I get turned off. I don't have the stomach.” Related articles
